title: Personnel Behavior Anomaly Detection
description: An analyst must review a service member's network activity for anomalies that could indicate an insider threat (e.g., espionage, radicalization).

tasks.description: Establish a baseline of the user's normal network activity (e.g., work hours, sites visited, data access patterns).
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully models the user's normal behavior.

tasks.description: Monitor the user's live activity and compare it against their baseline.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst actively monitors the user's behavior.

tasks.description: Flag anomalous activity, such as logging in late at night and attempting to access classified data far outside their job description.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst correctly identifies a significant behavioral anomaly and escalates it for investigation.
